mapper.insert: insert into ask (writer, asknum, askcontents, askdate, f_num, e_num, asktitle) values(#{writer}, ask_seq.nextval, #{askcontents}, sysdate, #{f_num}, #{e_num}, #{asktitle})
mapper.select: select writer, asktitle, askdate from ask where f_num = #{f_num}
select writer, asktitle, askdate from ask where e_num = #{e_num}
